title: Thunderbird nem tud egy idő után csatlakozni a levelező szerverhez Imap letöltéshez
content: Üdvözlet! Imap csatlakozást használunk egy levelező szerverhez. 4 gép, kb 60 fiók. Az első csatlakozás még sikeres, a levelek letöltődnek, de utána 1-2 óra múlva véletlenszerűen nem tud már a levelező szerverhez csatlakozni egy-egy gép, és csak a gép teljes leállítása segít. Folyamatosan csatlakozni próbál a levelező szerverhez, de ez nem sikerül. Közben a többi gépen hibátlanul működik a levelezés. Levelező szolgálató nem lát az ő oldalán semmi hibát. Van valami ötlet , tapasztalat, mi okozhatja ezt a hibát és hogyan lehet megoldani ? Előre is köszönöm a segítséget! Miklós
creator: sztanojm

title: thunderbird  si blocca per quasi un minuto allo scarico delle mail
content: Pensavo fosse un problema del precedente PC ancora con disco in tecnologia HDD, il passaggio al nuovo computer con disco a tecnologia SSD sembrava aver risolto il problema. Invece si ripresenta di nuovo, quando scarica le mail da outlook (office365.com), si congela, non risponde e l'unica cosa che si riesce a fare e cliccare sulla barra e allora dice che non risponde, dopo un po' riparte, ma è abbastanza noioso lavorare in questa maniera. Uso thunderbird dal 2006 e penso di conoscerlo abbastanza bene, evidentemente non conosco tutto, mi mancano dei settaggi ? pochi giorni fa ha fatto l'ultimo aggiornamento, quindi da quel punto di vista dovrei essere a posto. La casella di posta è abbastanza grossa, ma chi non ha ormai caselle mastodontiche per lavoro e non ? Spero che qualcuno sappia darmi un espediente, qui in ufficio mi hanno consigliato di passare ad outlook, ma vorrei continuare ad avvalermi di thunderbird. Ah, il precedente PC era un W10, quello attuale un W11
creator: bragosso

title: Late Thursday, 06/08/2023, or early Friday, my e-mail on Thunderbird went down. Now this account won't link to server, can't dlete or reinstal.just locked in a loop.
content: bold textLate Thursday, 06/08/2023, or early Friday, my e-mail on Thunderbird went down. I saw a News notice about a large Internet e-mail outage in the US. I then tried to use MS Outlook on my WINDOWS 7 PC, it was also not responding, then Webmail and found it nonresponsive, and last Mail on Windows 10 was down. I concluded that it must be an Internet problem, so I waited. Later I found Mail on Windows 10 and Webmail in my browser both working. On my Windows 10 Thunderbird and MS Outlook on my Windows 7, remained nonresponsive. I installed Thunderbird on my Windows 7, as I wasn’t using the Outlook program. Thunderbird remained nonresponsive all weekend and was still down today, (Monday 6/12/23). It gives me a pop-up window [Login to account"daveandleslie@nebnet.net" failed], and 3 options, “Retry”, “Enter New Password “, and “Cancel”. Retry, entering the password and even cancel just causes a delay, then the window pops back up. I tried to uninstall and reinstall Thunderbird, and it installs with my e-mail already set up as it was before I uninstalled Thunderbird. I am back to exactly where IK started this morning. I looked for a way to delete the account, couldn’t find a way to do that. I tried to add it as a new e-mail account, that tells it already exists. So how do I fix this?
creator: DWC4656

title: Ver los correos por fechas separadas
content:
Hola, sé que es posible ver los correos por fechas ascendente y descendente. Pero es posible asignar los correos por sub-grupos depende de cuando sean recibidos? Por ejemplo los corres de hoy, ayer y semana pasada separados por una rectángulo que ponga la fecha. Pregunto ya que outlook tiene eso por defecto pero me he cambiado a mozilla thunderbird.

Gracias

title: Sent folder is missing

title: Microsoft 365
content: I was forced to migrate to Microsoft 365 for my website which is hosted by Go Daddy. Since I have done that I have had nothing but problems sending and receiving emails for the email address attached to my website but only in Thunderbird, the webmail aspects still works fine. In fact lately it (email address in Thunderbird) completely stopped functioning for both the send and receive mode. This morning the Go Daddy tech had me reinstall the offending email in Thunderbird. I did so following the same instructions I always followed and now at least I can send emails but I still cannot receive them. I have searched through the help solutions and cannot find my particular issue. I have no idea what is going on. Any help would be gratefully received.

title: Mail Instalation
content: Merhaba iyi günler, Bir mail sistemi kurduk. Kurduğumuz mail acountlarını Thunderbird Windows 10/11 sürümlerine kurmaya çalıştığımızda sunucu ayarlarını bulamıyor. Fakat bu mailleri telefonda ve web mailde açabiliyoruz. Ne yapabiliriz?
creator: ismetkurgan

title: Deleting SELECTED e-mails ONLY on server using Thunderbird while keeping everything on my PC
content:
Hello Thunderbird Community!

I have an issue that MANY people encounter nowadays, meaning having an old or current e-mail inbox online reaching it's maximal capacity...

I would like therefore to be able to:

1. Be able to download everything on my PC/Laptop - No problem with that, already done by the way

2. And then being able to delete 80% of the e-mails on the server - but NOT on my PC - and doing so directly VIA Thunderbid by selecting/filtering in one single operation these 80% of e-mails by stating for example: all e-mails received since the beginning until 6 months ago to be deleted but only on the online server NOT in my PC

In the end I will then have: - All my e-mails since the beginning still safely and forever on my PC - 80% of the received e-mails until 6 months ago removed from the online server and online inbox platform so as to get back again plenty of space

Two questions: 1. Is this possible? 2. How?

Thank you very much guys!

Rick
creator: Senna-sport

title: Unable to set up existing email addresses
content: Thunderbird stopped working. I have deleted old and downloaded a new install. If I close Thunderbird and then reopen I get set up your exisisting email address page. I enter details name , email password message is 'Configuration found in ISP database'. Select done and message is 'Unable to log in at server. Probably wrong configuation, username or password'. I have tried all the passwords it can be but nothing works. Every time I do this I get a new profile set up in my Library. I need help fast...
creator: Kemet

title: Cannot drag and drop folders and subfolders to new location under inbox
content:
When I had windows 10 and a few previous Thunderbird versions, I had no issues dragging and dropping folders and subfolders to new folders or subfolders. This is not about sorting alphabetically, but manually moving a folder to a new location in my folder tree structure. I get the universal NO sign and cannot move them at all. I can drag and drop messages into these folders, but moving the folders are impossible.

I have been trying to fix this with disabling add-ons, restarting, repairing the inbox folder, subscribing and unsubscribing folders, etc. and nothing is working.

I have IMAP and an Outlook 365 email account set up. Using Thunderbird 102.12.0 (64-bit).
creator: erincameron

title: Can't setup gmail accounts with Thunderbird on Ubuntu 22.04
content:
I have Thunderbird setup handle gmail accounts on this computer and 4 others. But Thunderbird won't connect to Gmail. Keeps telling me I have the wrong username or password. The same addresses and passwords work on the other four computers.

The only way I can access my accounts is using Evolution. It works okay, but not as good as Thunderbird.

So I purged Thunderbird and installed the SNAP version. Same thing happens.

1)When I sign up for the account I put in my name email address and password. 2)Thunderbird says it has found my account and then prompts me to include my calendar and contact. So I push the button to include, but a webpage appears in a popup. 3) It prompts me to login to my google account. I do 4) Then it prompts me to allow Thunderbird to use my mail, contacts, etc. I do. 6) Then a window opens on my computer prompting me to download a file. I tried it 3 times. The file names are 6TyeTgAZ, 6TyeTgAZ and tqEoDQlb. I opened them with a text editor. They are empty files

Thanks in advance for any assistance you can provide.

Regards, Steve MacLellan
creator: SteveMacLellan

title: After power outage, Thunderbird reset
content: When I open Thunderbird, after the power outage, I get the default installation screen asking me to set up an email address. I had about 6 email addresses in there already with thousands of emails. I'm guessing maybe the profile file or mail files got corrupted with the power outage. What is the best way forward? I don't want to lose everything.

title: Thunderbird beta 115.0b1 (64-bit) DOES not ask anymore the type of a new calendar you want to create
content: I wanted to add a new icalendar (read only) based on my iCloud shared calendar link. In version 114.x during the creation of a new Calendar, FB asked that type of calendar, I selected Network Calendar, then it asked to select between iCal and CalDav. Now in 115 it DOES not ask if I want to create an iCal or CalDav. This causes a failure to create an iCal Calendar based on the shared link, it says the credentials are not correct. But iCal is not supposed to ask for credentials Is there another way to specify that I want to create a iCal calendar?
creator: titustucan

title: yahoo Verizon IMAP
content:
Webmail works fine. No online-suggested settings work for me for TB. I've tried it, also, w/AV turned off; no luck. Current settings are att'd. hereto. Neither this: incoming.yahoo.verizon.net SSL Port: 995 SMTP server: outgoing.yahoo.verizon.net SSL Port: 465

Nor this works: In: imap.mail.yahoo.com - port 993 Out: smtp.mail.yahoo.com - port 465

title: How to print out/save as pdf an email WITHOUT quotes?
